How we got our start? Palouse Brand is a 5th generation, family-owned and vertically-integrated farm that grows, cleans, processes, packages, and ships premium legumes and grains directly to customers around the world. What makes our product unique? We take pride in quality and transparency.

t: Palouse Brand and Clear Creek Foods
s: Shop our family farmed Kosher Certified, Non-GMO Certified, Sustainable Grown and Non-Irradiated, legumes and grains. FREE 2-Day Shipping. We are 5th generation farmers from Washington.
